thread.title: Pictures: Pink Party West Hartford 2015
thread.title_full: Pictures: Pink Party West Hartford 2015 - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Pictures: Pink Party West Hartford 2015
text:
Caption Pink Party 2015 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Sporting a smile breast cancer survivor Elaine Lindsley, 22, of Bristol, models an athletic outfit during the 4th annual Pink Party held in Blue Back Square, West Hartford, Wednesday evening, Oct. 7, Lindsley has been cancer free since August 31. Hundreds attended the breast-cancer awareness fundraiser for a fun filled night including live entertainment by the Shaded Soul Band and a fashion show by Kimberly Boutique featuring breast-cancer survivors. Giveaways, swag bags, raffle prizes and exclusive food and drink tastings were also offered throughout the evening. A portion of the proceeds will support breast cancer research and local breast cancer programs through Komen Connecticut. (Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant) Pink Party 2015 Alex Syphers | Special to the Courant Lydia Tomarchio, 10, of Newington, signs a pink Scion during the 4th annual Pink Party breast-cancer awareness event held in Blue Back Square, West Hartford, Wednesday evening, Oct. 7. The Scion, provided by Gale Toyota of Enfield, was painted with a rubber paint so guests of the paty could sign congratulations and remembrances to those with breast cancer. A portion of the proceeds will support breast cancer research and local breast cancer programs through Komen Connecticut. Click here to view a video of the event.
